question: What is the name of the traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan?
asked_question_translated: Ako sa volá tradičná záhrada v japonskom meste Kanazawa, známa ako jedna z troch veľkých japonských záhrad?
answer: Tradičná záhrada v japonskom meste Kanazawa sa volá Kenroku-en.
answer_translated_eng: A traditional garden in Kanazawa, Japan is called Kenroku-en.
